meanings.definition: To raise or lift up again.
meanings.sent1: She reelevated the picture on the wall after it fell.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers reelevated the fallen beam back into place.
meanings.sent3: After the wind knocked it down, she reelevated the kite with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The team captain reelevated the morale of the players with an inspiring speech.
meanings.sent5: The sun reelevated the colors of the sky as it set behind the mountains.

meanings.definition: To promote to a higher position again.
meanings.sent1: The company reelevated him to manager after his successful project.
meanings.sent2: She was reelevated to team leader for her exceptional leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat reelevated itself to the top of the bookshelf, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His dedication and hard work reelevated him to a respected position in the company.
meanings.sent5: The music reelevated the atmosphere of the party, making everyone dance.
